content: both loop pieces decrease single_crochet across through both thicknesses thus closing top of loop opening chain 5 turn single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chain single_crochet across 7 sts the sts that formed the loop closing chain 5 turn single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 3 chain single_crochet in ea single_crochet across 14 single_crochet next row chain 1 turn increase in first single_crochet single_crochet across to last single_crochet increase in last single_crochet 16 single_crochet repeat last row until there are 24 sts work even in single_crochet on 24 sts until piece measures 18 from beginning fasten_off for 2-color scarf make another piece in second color for 1-color scarf make another piece in same color finishing heart edging with matching yarn attach yarn at top edge of one heart piece next to loop opening and single_crochet evenly around edge of heart working 3 single_crochet in point fasten_off and weave in all ends hold straight edges of scarf pieces decrease to join them at center back and whipstitch together so seam lies flat if necessary lightly block scarf between damp towels so hearts lie flat leave to dry in a place with good air circulation to wear fold center portion of scarf in half lengthwise place scarf around neck and insert one heart through ribbed loop section copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
